item.title: How to install PHP 5.6 and 7.0 - 8.4 with PHP-FPM and FastCGI mode for ISPConfig 3.2 with apt on Debian 11 to 12
item.description: In this guide we will take you through installing additional PHP versions (5.6, 7.0, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 8.1, 8.2, 8.3, and 8.4) on a Debian server with ISPConfig.

item.title: How to install PHP 5.6 and 7.0 - 8.4 with PHP-FPM and FastCGI mode for ISPConfig 3.2 with apt on Ubuntu 22.04 - 24.04
item.description: When using ISPConfig, by default, you only have the main PHP version for your distribution. This guide will show you how to install additional PHP versions (5.6, 7.0 - 7.4, 8.1 - 8.4) on an Ubuntu server with ISPConfig.

item.title: Update the ISPConfig Perfect Server from Debian 11 to Debian 12
item.description: This tutorial will take you through updating a server managed by ISPConfig from Debian 11 (bullseye) to Debian 12 (bookworm). This guide works for both single- and multiserver setups.

item.title: How to Install CSF (Config Server Firewall) on Debian 12
item.description: CSF or Config Server Firewall is a Stateful Packet Inspection (SPI) firewall based on IPtables and Perl. it provides a daemon process that will monitor your services for failure authentication.

item.title: How to Install Wiki.js on Debian 12
item.description: Wiki.js is free and open-source wiki software based on Node.js, Git, and Markdown. In this article, we'll show you how to install Wiki.js on a Debian 12 system.

item.title: ISPConfig Perfect Multiserver setup on Ubuntu 24.04 and Debian 12
item.description: This tutorial will take you through installing your own ISPConfig 3 multiserver setup with dedicated servers for the panel, web, DNS, mail, and webmail using the new ISPConfig auto-installer. This tutorial is compatible with Debian 12 and Ubuntu 24.04.

item.title: Securing your ISPConfig 3 managed mailserver with a valid Let's Encrypt SSL certificate
item.description: If you're running your own mailserver, it's best practice to connect to it securely with a SSL/TLS connection. You'll need a valid certificate for these secure connections. In this tutorial, we'll set up a Let's Encrypt certificate for our mailserver that renews automatically.

item.title: How to Install OpenEMR on Ubuntu 24.04 Server
item.description: OpenEMR is an open-source health records and medical practice management solution. It is a fully integrated electronic health record and practice management, scheduling, electronic billing, and internationalization support.

item.title: How to Install Moodle LMS on Debian 12 Server
item.description: Moodle is an open solution for the Learning Management System (LMS). It is a platform for educational purposes, from creating online courses, managing online schools, managing content, and offering collaborative learning.

item.title: How to Install GlassFish Application Server with Nginx Reverse Proxy on Debian 12
item.description: GlassFish is a free and open-source implementation of the Java EE Platform developed by Eclipse. In this guide, you will install GlassFish Application Server on Debian 12 in a step-by-step process. You will also configure Nginx as a reverse proxy for your GlassFish installation.
